::Firearm::

Firearm felt the sickening thud, hoping that Beastbox was out of the 
action. His only alternative now was to get up and get some repair. 
Internal systems were damaged, as well as the extra damage that 
Beastbox had just done, which had taken out another armor plate. 
Firearm transforms into robot mode, flying up at full speed. He 
points at Beastbox with his arm cannon, firing two explosive charges.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> All Beasbox could see was the looming shadow of the tank about to 
him him,
> he fire up as many times as he could, but the shadow grew very 
large over
> top of him. He tried to leap out of the way, but the huge tank 
landed right
> on top of him. A sickening thud resounded all around. (He isnt 
totally
> flat, so Firearm will be sort of on a small bump)
